mapper.update: update TRTrafficAccidentInvolvedPersons set TrafficAccidentID = #{trafficAccidentID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, InvolvedPersonCertID = #{involvedPersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, InvolvedPersonName = #{involvedPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonRemark = #{involvedPersonRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InvolvedPersonContact = #{involvedPersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TAccidentPersonsID = #{TAccidentPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select TAccidentPersonsID, TrafficAccidentID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRTrafficAccidentInvolvedPersons where TAccidentPersonsID = #{TAccidentPersonsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select TAccidentPersonsID, TrafficAccidentID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRTrafficAccidentInvolvedPersons where TrafficAccidentID = #{id}
select TAccidentPersonsID, TrafficAccidentID, InvolvedPersonCertID, InvolvedPersonName, InvolvedPersonRemark, InvolvedPersonContact from TRTrafficAccidentInvolvedPersons
